title: How Could He Possibly Know That? (feat. Jeremiah Watkins)
description: Jacob recalls a low point in his life when he made an odds defying insult at the mall. Dan creates a new comic alter-ego and tests it out on Jay and guest Jeremiah Watkins.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Comedy Central)
